desc: Tata Sampann Garam Masala is made from whole spices that retain their natural oils, ensuring a rich and aromatic blend for Indian curries and dals.
Tata Sampann Turmeric Powder is sourced from high-curcumin turmeric, enhancing the flavor and health benefits of your daily cooking.
Tata Sampann Red Chilli Powder is made from the finest chillies, ensuring vibrant color and balanced heat for your spicy dishes.
Tata Sampann Kitchen King Masala is a perfect blend of spices, ideal for enhancing the flavor of a variety of Indian dishes.
Tata Sampann Coriander Powder is ground from whole coriander seeds, delivering a fresh and earthy flavor to curries and gravies.
Tata Sampann Chana Masala is a special blend of premium spices, perfect for making authentic and flavorful chickpea curry.
Tata Sampann Pav Bhaji Masala is a balanced mix of spices, ensuring an authentic street-style taste for homemade pav bhaji.
Tata Sampann Meat Masala is a flavorful and aromatic spice mix that enhances the taste of meat-based dishes with its rich blend of whole spices.
Tata Sampann Shahi Paneer Masala is a rich blend of spices that adds a royal and creamy taste to paneer dishes.
Tata Sampann Sambhar Masala is a perfect blend of South Indian spices, giving your sambhar a rich, tangy, and authentic taste.
Tata Sampann Hing is a premium-quality, aromatic spice known for its strong flavor and digestive benefits. Perfect for enhancing the taste of dal, curries, and Indian snacks.
